channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: 4 things to know about the vaccine ingredient thimerosal
item.description: Advisers to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommended against flu shots containing the ingredient thimerosal. Why is the additive, safely used since the 1930s, being questioned again?
item.content:encoded:
Advisers to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommended against flu shots containing the ingredient thimerosal. Why is the additive, safely used since the 1930s, being questioned again?

(Image credit: Marie D. De Jesus/Houston Chronicle/Hearst Newspapers)
item.dc:creator: Sydney Lupkin

item.title: Tropical Storm Chantal brings heavy rains into northeastern South Carolina
item.description: Tropical Storm Chantal grew in strength as it approached the southeast U.S. coast. It's forecasted to bring heavy rains to parts of the Carolinas on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
Tropical Storm Chantal grew in strength as it approached the southeast U.S. coast. It's forecasted to bring heavy rains to parts of the Carolinas on Sunday.

(Image credit: NOAA)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Dalai Lama, a global symbol of Tibetan culture and resistance, turns 90
item.description: The Dalai Lama turned 90 on Sunday surrounded by thousands of followers, who thronged the Himalayan town of Dharamshala.
item.content:encoded:
The Dalai Lama turned 90 on Sunday surrounded by thousands of followers, who thronged the Himalayan town of Dharamshala.

(Image credit: Ashwini Bhatia)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Iran's supreme leader makes first public appearance since Iran-Israel war started
item.description: Iran' s Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei on Saturday made his first public appearance since the 12-day war between Israel and Iran began, attending a mourning ceremony on the eve of Ashoura.
item.content:encoded:
Iran' s Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei on Saturday made his first public appearance since the 12-day war between Israel and Iran began, attending a mourning ceremony on the eve of Ashoura.

(Image credit: Office of the Iranian Supreme Leader)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: More than 50 dead in catastrophic Texas flooding and dozens missing from girls camp
item.description: More than 50 people are dead following flooding that slammed central Texas over the weekend, while a desperate search for more than two dozen missing schoolgirls continues.
item.content:encoded:
More than 50 people are dead following flooding that slammed central Texas over the weekend, while a desperate search for more than two dozen missing schoolgirls continues.

(Image credit: Sergio Martínez-Beltrán)
item.dc:creator: Sergio Martínez-Beltrán

item.title: Here's a timeline of the catastrophic Texas floods
item.description: NPR has compiled a timeline of when local, state and federal officials posted warnings on social media as well as the timeline of events as presented by local officials.
item.content:encoded:
NPR has compiled a timeline of when local, state and federal officials posted warnings on social media as well as the timeline of events as presented by local officials.

(Image credit: Ronaldo Schemidt)
item.dc:creator: Gabrielle Emanuel

item.title: Cuts to HIV research funding in the US impacts progress towards ending the epidemic
item.description: How will the Trump administration's cuts to HIV research impact the progress that's been made towards ending the epidemic in the U.S.?
item.content:encoded: How will the Trump administration's cuts to HIV research impact the progress that's been made towards ending the epidemic in the U.S.?
item.dc:creator: Pien Huang

item.title: Heat and wildfire smoke affect birth outcomes, according to a new study
item.description: Heat and wildfire smoke affect birth outcomes, according to a new study of women in Los Angeles.
item.content:encoded: Heat and wildfire smoke affect birth outcomes, according to a new study of women in Los Angeles.
item.dc:creator: Alejandra Borunda

item.title: Photos: Texas reels from deadly flooding
item.description: Gov. Greg Abbott says the state will work day and night to find people who may be stranded and unable to call for help.
item.content:encoded:
Gov. Greg Abbott says the state will work day and night to find people who may be stranded and unable to call for help.

(Image credit: Julio Cortez
)
item.dc:creator: NPR Staff

item.title: How this long-lost Chinese typewriter from the 1940s changed modern computing
item.description: The concepts in the MingKwai typewriter underlie how Chinese, Japanese and Korean are typed today. The typewriter, patented in 1946, was found last year in an upstate New York basement.
item.content:encoded:
The concepts in the MingKwai typewriter underlie how Chinese, Japanese and Korean are typed today. The typewriter, patented in 1946, was found last year in an upstate New York basement.

(Image credit: Elisabeth von Boch)
item.dc:creator: Emily Feng
